name: Pineapple Fields Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pineapple Fields exceeded all of our expectations! Wonderful central Eleuthra location-Some units still under construction (but that did not bother us). The units are like a small one bedroom apartment-fully equipped-kitchen, open to the living room ,covered porch--washer/dryer/separate spacious bedroom, Everything you need except beach towels and beach chairs. You need to bring everything-coffee, sugar, etc-you can pack a cooler and check with your luggage. Bring cash-most places do not take credit cards....
reviews.title: Pineapple Fields, Eleuthra

likes.disliked: — stairs from parking lot to buildings

reviews.title: Don't miss it!
reviews.text: There is a great deli as well as Their resturant "Tippy's" is wonderful-right on the property--beach front, to be exact Beautiful pool area in the center of the complex. The people of Eleuthra are the most friendly and accomidating--We can not wait to go back! We walked the beach every day and did not see anyone else. This is the place to go for peace and quiet-hardly any nite life or shopping. While we were there the phones went out (get a local cell phone at the airport-US phones do not work). We never could figure out the tv (thank goodness)...and one day we did not have water---Like I said we can not wait to go back!

This is a new property (timeshare/rental). Construction has ended. However, some cosmetic work is still being done on some of the units as well as some of the landscaping. The property is located across the street from the beach.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a spacious upper level one bedroom apartment (#722). The decoration is light and airy. Everything looks very new and very pretty. There's a living room, bedroom, small kitchen (with all the cooking appliances and dinnerware), bathroom, and 2 decks (front and back). The unit has a.c., ceiling fans, washer/dryer, a safe, tv/dvd player in bedroom and living room, tape/cd player in living room. There is daily maid service. A nice pool is located in the middle of the property (deepest depth 4.5 feet). I read in an earlier review to bring your own beach towels. We did. But there were e beach towels in our unit. Pineapple Fields was definitely a home away from home. We loved it.
reviews.title: Stay Left!
Field of Dreams
reviews.text: --I had a big issue with holes in the ground that weren't covered properly. Not a good thing if you have kids running around.

reviews.title: The Dreaming Place
reviews.text: --The landscaping around our building wasn't done, so the immediate surrounding area wasn't very pretty to look at.

description: The resort and restaurant are located on the most beautiful beach in the Out Islands. The property features an oversized pool, acres of lush tropical landscape, a gourmet deli, boutique and sporting/rental shop. One-bedroom units feature a master bedroom and bath, living room with a queen size pull out sofa-bed, full kitchens, verandas with teak furniture, cable TV, ceiling fans, AC, wireless internet and in-room phones. Two-bedroom units include a second bath and bedroom with (2) twin beds.
